title: The golden grove, or, A manuall of daily prayers and letanies, fitted to the dayes of the week containing a short summary of what is to be believed, practised, desired : also festival hymns, according to the manner of the ancient church, composed for the use of the devout, especially of younger persons / by the author of The great exemplar.
author: Taylor, Jeremy, 1613-1667.
publisher: Printed by J.F. for R. Royston ...,
notes: Written by Jeremy Taylor. Cf. BM.
Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
